alert.note: Alert for Baker County; Harney County; Malheur County; Oregon Lower Treasure Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 09 at 12:49PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MDT/9 PM PDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Idaho and Oregon, including the following areas, in southwest Idaho, Lower Treasure Valley ID, Owyhee Mountains and Southwest Highlands. In Oregon, Baker County, Harney County, Malheur County and Oregon Lower Treasure Valley. * WHEN...Until 10 PM MDT/9 PM PDT/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Up to two inches total rainfall from slow-moving showers and thunderstorms. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Baker County; Harney County; Malheur County; Oregon Lower Treasure Valley
